entries.title: I was not prepared for Microsoft to surprise launch an action game that goes this hard
entries.description: Hi-Fi Rush's rhythmic combat is full of flashy combos and delicious grooves.

entries.title: The Day Before developers now say the launch delay was planned before the Steam takedown
entries.description: Fntastic initially blamed the eight month delay of The Day Before on a trademark dispute.

entries.title: Hogwarts Legacy will have more than 100 sidequests and doesn't care if you cast evil spells
entries.description: Everything in Hogwarts Legacy is "interconnected," except extreme criminality.

entries.title: Bungie's narrative team reveals why SIVA never came back in Destiny 2
entries.description: "SIVA is a story that was told in Rise of Iron, and was finalised in Rise of Iron."

entries.title: Meet Your Maker, one of the year's most promising shooters, is having an open beta in February
entries.description: The Dead By Daylight studio's new game will be open to all during the upcoming Steam Next Fest.

entries.title: Even if you find Deadpool funny, you won't get much out of Marvel's Midnight Suns' first DLC
entries.description: Flat missions, clunky enemy design, and its star's generic combat abilities make The Good, The Bad, and The Undead an underwhelming start to the season pass

entries.title: Exclusive: The sickest pinball game of 2019 is getting a sequel
entries.description: Xenotilt is the sequel to the best virtual pinball game, and this time it's got cyborgs.

entries.title: Pizza Tower review: Madcap platforming at 100mph
entries.description: A non-stop, absurd, and wonderful slice of speedrunning action

entries.title: Hitman 3's new name, new mode, and new graphics tech are here
entries.description: A whole new world.

entries.title: Bungie is finally giving players a way to earn classic shaders and armour sets
entries.description: Just be warned: Those old Iron Banner and Trials sets are going to take some work to acquire.

entries.title: Dead Space Marker Fragment locations: How to get the secret ending
entries.description: Collect these mysterious markers to unlock a new fate.

entries.title: Everything that's new in the Dead Space remake
entries.description: Wondering what's been added to the original?

entries.title: Dead Space Security Clearance: How to unlock each level
entries.description: Gain clearance to loot locked rooms and containers.

entries.title: Dead Space weapon locations: Where to get every gun
entries.description: No more buying guns but you do have to spend a bit of time finding them.

entries.title: My most anticipated FPS this year comes from ex-Battlefield devs, and its destructibility looks unreal
entries.description: The Finals is coming, and it could be big.

entries.title: Dead Space Crew Rig locations for Master Override
entries.description: Complete the "You Are Not Authorised" side quest.

entries.title: Dead Space review
entries.description: A definitive remake and promising precedent for Dead Space's future.

entries.title: Naughty Dog is done with Uncharted, but The Last of Us is an open question
entries.description: Oh Neil, you tease.

entries.title: My heart is aching for this tiny single slot RTX 4090
entries.description: I'm drooling over this video test of Alphacool's gorgeous RTX 4090 block.

entries.title: Melting Terminator T-1000 bots can unclog your digestive system and break out of mini jail cells
entries.description: Researchers are putting "phase shifting bots" into action in a host of strange applications.

entries.title: Major US defence corp says no, playing War Thunder doesn't make you a threat to national security
entries.description: Raytheon has bigger fish to fry than your Steam library.

entries.title: Improve your RTX 4090's thermals by playing in a -53°C snowdrift
entries.description: -53°C temps in northern China has meant no overheating worries for this Intel Core i9 1300K & Nvidia RTX 4090 gaming PC build.

entries.title: Realism mod for Fallout 4 fixes its most unbelievable part: your ability to survive the intro
entries.description: Finally, an intro that makes sense.

entries.title: Here's when Dead Space releases in your time zone
entries.description: Release times broken down by region.

entries.title: Sierra's classic city builder returns next month with Pharaoh: A New Era
entries.description: Announced in 2020, the remake now has a release date.

entries.title: Wordle hint and answer today: Let's solve #586, January 26
entries.description: Wordle today: The solution and a hint for the #586 puzzle.

entries.title: Justice for Miranda finally achieved, thanks to Mass Effect mod
entries.description: Miranda's Long Walk makes the genetically engineered perfectionist worthwhile at last.

entries.title: Microsoft is shutting down its metaverse
entries.description: AltspaceVR has already been through this once.

entries.title: Oh great, crypto miners are selling repainted GPUs and passing them off as new
entries.description: Turns out those 'new' graphics cards on some Chinese retailers might not be after all.

entries.title: I played that $2,000 Steam game, and its ridiculous price is probably for the best
entries.description: You could buy the game and refund it, but I don't recommend it.

entries.title: Twitch finally plans to make pre-roll ads tolerable this year
entries.description: The platform is trying to make it easier to discover new streamers.
